DOC.brief_summary: This study explore perception , experience , belief knowledge around teenage pregnancy , motherhood , sexual reproductive health , family plan support structure adolescent refugee migrant identify demographic , social medical characteristic study participant .
DOC.brief_title: Teenage Pregnancies Refugee Migrant Adolescents Thai-Myanmar Border
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct follow : - 12-24 individual interview pregnant postnatal adolescent girl ( < 20 year ) ; - 1 Focus group discussion 6-10 non-pregnant female adolescent ( < 20 year ) ; - 1 Focus group discussion 6-10 adolescent men ( < 20 year ) ; - 1 Focus group discussion 6-10 Shoklo malaria research unit antenatal care staff ; Interviews focus group discussion conduct study participant agree participate discussion teenage pregnancy motherhood , sexual reproductive health . In-depth interview focus group discussion conduct private meeting room proximity antenatal clinic wait area . In-depth interview Focus group discussion co-facilitated principal investigator train counsellor/midwife fluent Karen , Burmese English . Focus group discussion run separately Burmese- Karen-speaking participant participant separate subgroup . Focus group discussion include 6-10 participant per group focus group discussion last 45-60 minute . Individual in-depth interview last approximately 60 minute .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion adolescent mother ( subgroup 1 ) : Aged 12 < 20 year Females Migrant refugee status Myanmar nationality Any trimester pregnancy 12 month post partum Able willing participate give inform consent Inclusion criterion nonpregnant female adolescent ( subgroup 2 ) : Aged < 20 year Females Migrant refugee status Myanmar nationality No past current pregnancy Able willing participate give inform consent Inclusion criterion adolescent men ( subgroup 3 ) : Aged < 20 year Males Migrant refugee status Myanmar nationality Able willing participate give inform consent Inclusion criterion health staff ( subgroup 4 ) : No age restriction Females male Migrant , refugee nonmigrant status Any nationality Able willing participate give informed consent Any participant deem researcher health staff acutely physically mentally unwell exclude . Participants meet age requirement , migration status nationality requirement
